name: Zytion's Tactical Game
description:
A Turn-based tactics game without shooting.  You have to bait enemies into hitting each other with their own bullets .

This is the 3rd game I have made and I am quite proud of this buggy mess. It may not work great, but I learned a lot in the process of making it and I hope to do better next year.

Thank you for taking a look!
